<xs:complexType name="ATTRIBUTESTYPE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A generic name/value Attributes type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="xs:anyType"> <xs:attribute name="NAME" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:minLength value="1"/> <xs:maxLength value="64"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="STRINGType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; The set of strings that do not contain the carriage return, line feed nor tab characters, that have no leading or trailing spaces and that have no internal sequences of two or more spaces.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MSISDNType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; Telephone Number of mobile phone; acronym for Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="5[0-9]{9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TELNOType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; Telephone Number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[1-9][0-9]{9}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="GLOBALTELNOType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; Telephone Number of mobile phone in long format</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IPV4Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; IP Address type in V4 format</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[0-2]?[0-9]?[0-9]\.[0-2]?[0-9]?[0-9]\.[0-2]?[0-9]?[0-9]\.[0-2]?[0-9]?[0-9]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IPV6Type"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; IP Address type in V6 format</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9A-F]{1,4}:[0-9A-F]{1,4}:[0-9A-F]{1,4}:[0-9A-F]{1,4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BOOLEANType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; Boolean type one of case insensitive "Y","N","1","0","true","false" indication true, false respectively</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="([YyNn01Xx_]|true|false){1}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CURRENCYType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper entity; type for currency; typically float or double</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="URLType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper entity; Simple type for URL validity check</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="(https?|ftp|file).*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="TAXNOType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper entity; TAX No</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{10,11}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="IBANType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; IBAN</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}[0-9]{2}[A-Z0-9]{5}[A-Z0-9]{1}[A-Z0-9]{16}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="POSTCODEType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; EMAIL address</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{5}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="EMAILType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Helper Entity; EMAIL address</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:pattern value="[-_a-zA-Z0-9]+(\.[-_a-zA-Z0-9]+)*@[-a-zA-Z0-9]+(\.[-a-zA-Z0-9]+)*\.(([0-9]{1,3})|([a-zA-Z]{2,10}))"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="ENTITYBaseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="EL_ACTION" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Requested Elementary Action:C, R, U or D</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:token"> <xs:maxLength value="1"/> <xs:pattern value="[CRUDScruds]"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="VALIDITY_PERIOD" type="VALIDITY_PERIODType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>See VALIDITY_PERIOD type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CHANGE_INFO" type="CHANGE_INFOType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>See CHANGE_INFO type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ACCESS_CONTROL_INFO" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>See ACCESS_CONTROL_INFO type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
